channel.title: dessert on matt9j:Matt Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in dessert on matt9j:Matt Johnson

item.title: Chocolate Cherry Jubilee Cake
item.description: My mom has been making this recipe for my family for as long as I can remember. It’s my sister’s favorite birthday cake, and probably mine as well! It’s especially good cold in a glass of milk… Instructions Preheat the oven to 350F Grease and flour the pan Mix cake ingredients together in a large bowl Beat 2 minutes after combined at high speed Pour into the pan Bake until a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean.

item.title: Hybrid Lemon Bars
item.description: Originally born from two recipes. The first, based on a slight modification to a filling from a major baking website. The second, for the crust, recited from memory over a phone call and hurriedly written down before again forgotten! Instructions Preheat oven to 350F. Line a glass 9x13 pan with parchment paper Mix crust wet ingredients together Add flour for the crust and combine Press into the baking pan Bake 17 minutes While crust is baking…
